tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LanguageRules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR(255),
    rule_description TEXT,
    parsing_expression TEXT,
    interpretation_expression TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LanguageRules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword VARCHAR,
  rule TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TextInputs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  input TEXT,
  language_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Languages (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  language_name VARCHAR,
  parser_version VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE rules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name TEXT,
    rule_expression TEXT,
    language_id INT REFERENCES languages(language_id),
    token_id INT REFERENCES tokens(token_id)
);
